item.title: Were Do I Place This?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @kunk kunk
item.description:
@kunk wrote:

if ((absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) || (absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2 && absX <= X! && absX >= X2))
return true;
else
return false;
}

item.title: Were Do I Place This?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

make another if statment and put it like this

public boolean nonWild() {
if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112)
return true;
else				
return false;			
}
if (absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2 && absX <= X! && absX >= X2)
return true;
else				
return false;			
}

well i thinks thats how you do it.

i wouldnt know because i dont make pk servers
